allow: Bash(docker exec nextops_backend python manage.py shell -c "from invoices.models import Invoice; inv = Invoice.objects.filter(id=36).first(); print(f''Factura 36 existe: {inv is not None}''); print(f''Tiene uploaded_file: {inv.uploaded_file is not None if inv else False}''); print(f''Path: {inv.uploaded_file.path if inv and inv.uploaded_file else None}'')")
